title: When will the tank meta end?
body: So I can play rengo top {{champion:107}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Rofl rengar gets a shit ton of amour pen anyway 
Try this 
{{item:3074}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3158}} or another {{item:3134}} if they are all tanky and you will a. one shot the sht out of anyone squishy (ADC, Mid lane, most junglers) and do a sht ton of damage vs tanks

only champions i lose to are kennen and rumble

I have 10 flat armor pen to start the game and that is my regular build anyway (except I have phantom dancer for effective running away/ hunting) it isn't enough in lane as usually ravenous is my first item
Before it was the assassin meta, now its tank
There's your problem, playing Rengar top.

He is really good against anyone but shen before they buy items
then if they get tanky shit he can do much but farm
